text: Syed Sibtey Razi (7 March 1939 â€“ 20 August 2022) was an Indian politician. He was a member of the Indian National Congress. He was the Governor of Assam for a short time in 2009 and was also the Governor of Jharkhand from 2004 to 2005. Razi was a member of the Rajya Sabha from 1980 to 1985 and again from 1988 to 1998. Razi was born in Raebareli, then-British India. Razi died on 20 August 2022 in Lucknow, India from heart disease at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Governors of Assam Category:Governors of Jharkhand Category:Politicians from Uttar Pradesh Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: Syed Sibtey Razi
